<a id="HScrollBar"></a>

# HScrollBar

**Inherits:** [ScrollBar](ScrollBar.md) **\<** [Range](Range.md) **\<** [Control](Control.md) **\<** [CanvasItem](CanvasItem.md) **\<** [Node](Node.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

A horizontal scrollbar that goes from left (min) to right (max).

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

A horizontal scrollbar, typically used to navigate through content that extends beyond the visible width of a control. It is a [Range](Range.md)-based control and goes from left (min) to right (max).
